TF024803-ENVIRON. ECONOMICS & EAS -
            ENV. ACTIVITIES IN SSA - PHASE III,TF039569-GHANA - TRADE AND INVESTMENT GATEWAY

abstracts.cdata!:
Ratings for the Trade and Investment
            Gateway Project for Ghana were as follows: outcomes were
            moderately satisfactory, the risk to development outcome was
            moderate, the Bank performance was satisfactory, and the
            Borrower performance was also satisfactory. Some lessons
            learned included: private developers for Export Processing
            Zone (EPZ) do not have to be international. Attracting firms
            to the EPZ does not have to be led by an international
            private developer. The international private developer
            failed to perform and the national developers took over and
            the EPZ is fully operational. Timely restructuring of a
            project can lead to a successful implementation of a
            project. When a project becomes very difficult to implement
            it's usually a sign that there is a need to revisit the
            fundamentals of the design and its concepts to enable
            retrofitting or adjustments of key features of the project
            for it to work.
